divs: Sighting DetailsAt a little after four am.Roy and myself were walking into the woods on ourfamily farm,heading east south east,when we noticed a very bright light movingvery fast from north to south. We are both former military,and this was movingfaster than any thing we had ever seen.We noticed that there was no sound fromany thing.animals wind or the craft. Wewatched it for about five minutes. Laterthat day, at around five pm.We saw an unmarked,C130aircraft flying east to westat about 150 feet.We could see the rivets in the underside of the wings,therewas no markings on this plane at all.It was painted flat black,had no runninglights,and flew directly over us,low and slow.ENTER YOUR NARRATIVE DESCRIPTIONHERE (you can type over these instructions.)Please limit your narrative to 500words (equivalent to 1 typed page).
Summary: extreamly fast craft,and unmarked black plane
